str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and leipo; to leave down, i.e. Behind; by implication, to abandon, have remaining.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From phobos; to frighten, i.e. to be alarmed; by analogy, to be in awe of, i.e. Revere.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A king, ruler, but in some passages clearly to be translated: emperor. Probably from basis; a sovereign.
An outburst of passion, wrath. From thuo; passion.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To persevere, endure, be steadfast, patient. From a derivative of kratos; to be strong, i.e. steadfast.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
